title: CreateDraft - Draft or Insights from any Legal document in seconds
introduction: CreateDraft is a tool designed to streamline the drafting process for legal teams, helping them create high-quality legal documents quickly and efficiently. It offers over 340 templates for various legal agreements and supports 25+ languages to cater to different jurisdictions.
features: Breaks down and simplifies tough contracts
Provides insights into clauses and hidden terms
No credit card required for free access
targetPeople: Legal teams, lawyers, and non-lawyers who need to draft or review legal documents

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We support the following payment methods: Credit card and Debit card.

faqs.question: Can I change plans?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upon switching plans, your current subscription will be cancelled immediately.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access to the features you've paid for until the end of your billing cycle.

faqs.question: What happens when my subscription expires?
faqs.answer: Once your subscription expires, you'll lose access to all the subscription features.
